Description:
Detects a suspicious process command line that uses whoami as first parameter (as e.g. used by EfsPotato)

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: WhoAmI as Parameter
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where command like '%.exe whoami%'
